result.text: President Xi Jinping underscored the importance of implementing the UN 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, putting development back on the international agenda as a central priority. He advocated for greater synergy in APEC members' development strategies and collaborative efforts to address the global development deficit.

Xi made the remarks in his speech at the 30th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.

result.text:
President Xi Jinping called on the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) members to stay committed to innovation-driven development, saying it is important to follow the trends of scientific and technological advancement, more proactively promote exchanges and cooperation in science and technology, and work together for an open, fair, equitable and non-discriminatory environment for scientific and technological progress.

Xi made the remarks in his speech at the 30th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.
